title: Senior Campaign Manager
content:
At AKQA Performance we imaginatively apply art and science to create transformative experiences, accelerate growth and future-proof organisations. AKQA Performance designs every touchpoint along the customer journey with unmatched native ability to define, find, connect, and inspire audiences across all brand interactions.
At AKQA, our Senior Campaign Managers harbour a deep-rooted passion for developing clear and compelling responses to briefs by leveraging their industry insight and expertise in paid media.
At AKQA you'll work in a meritocratic culture, surrounded by some of the brightest minds in their fields. You'll have the opportunity to learn and grow within a creative and technically-advanced team and have access to ongoing personal and professional development.
ROLE REQUIREMENTS
This role is for individuals who have a passion for using data and technology to generate innovative solutions in media. The ideal candidate will have a senior level of experience and will be required to independently research, plan, implement and optimise campaigns across multiple clients.

Maintain accurate and timely output and delivery.
Help to strengthen the profile of the Media team and drive team progression.
Ability to analyse data to provide insights and recommendations.
Proactively seek out testing and tactical opportunities to recommend to clients.
Deliver remarkable client service to become a go-to Campaign Manager in media and an agency partner.
Deliver strategic opportunities to strategy teams and clients based on analysis coupled with keen marketing intelligence.

QUALITIES AND CHARACTERISTICS
Individuals applying for this role must be able to provide clear evidence of campaign planning, implementation, management and optimisation.

Strong attention to detail and technical know-how
Demonstrable experience in a hands-on role in media with expertise in campaign management, data analysis, web analytics, digital marketing performance metrics, and marketing intelligence
Demonstrable experience in account and campaign design, setting up analytics, and analysing performance
Proof of certifications/training in media are advantageous
Work with key stakeholders to align business goals with marketing objectives, focussing on a strategic approach to media
Analyse toolsets and provide recommendations
Advanced MS Office Suite skills (especially Excel) and Google product suite
Demonstrable experience with Google Data Studio (or similar)
